sections.title: Progressive Delivery Advisory
sections.description: Our consultants leverage their expertise in cloud-native progressive delivery tools to assess your current deployment strategies and provide a roadmap for successful implementation.
offerings: Compare current deployment processes against industry best practices and create a tailored roadmap.
Audit your infrastructure for readiness and maturity, providing actionable recommendations.
Develop a deployment plan aligned with business goals for smooth progressive delivery adoption.
Select the right tools to enable zero-downtime releases and optimized deployments.

sections.title: Progressive Delivery Implementation
sections.description: Our architects help you build or migrate CI/CD pipelines into progressive delivery workflows, enabling safer and more frequent releases.
offerings: Blue-Green deployments for fast rollouts and rollbacks.
Canary deployments for controlled feature releases.
A/B testing to analyze user preferences.
Automated rollout and rollback strategies.
Traffic shaping to control user experience.
Automated testing and analysis in production.

sections.title: Enterprise Support for Progressive Delivery
sections.description: Our team ensures your pipelines and configurations work flawlessly with enterprise-grade support, covering Kubernetes configs, service meshes, traffic controllers, and more.
offerings: Real-time monitoring and logging to detect issues proactively.
Zero-downtime deployments using automated rollback strategies.
Regular updates, patches, and bug fixes for all progressive delivery tools.

sections.title: Progressive Delivery Tools Training
sections.description: Enable your teams to handle deployments independently with hands-on training on modern progressive delivery tools and strategies.
offerings: Workshops on Argo Rollouts and Flagger for deployments.
Master concepts like Blue-Green, Canary, A/B testing, and traffic splitting.
Implement best practices with expert guidance during deployment changes.
